thread.title: Sharp's Robohon is a cute little robot that doubles as a phone - PC World
thread.title_full: Sharp's Robohon is a cute little robot that doubles as a phone - PC World - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: PC World
title: Sharp's Robohon is a cute little robot that doubles as a phone - PC World
text:
From the country that brought you pretty much every crazy robot you've ever seen, Sharp on Tuesday showed off a prototype robot that doubles as a smartphone-or is that a smartphone in the form of a robot? It's not entirely clear, but it is cute. The robot, called RoboHon , will go on sale in Japan in the first half of 2016.
 PC World.
